item.title: Use KaTaX to render math
item.description: PaperMode theme is easy to use, but the math formatting render is not out of the box. Lucky, it is relatively easy to set up this feature. Set up First, you need to create the HTML file layouts/partials/extend_head.html relative to your website source code root.
